website_summaries.verdict: These high-quality glass jars are equal parts efficient and aesthetic, making them worth every cent.
pros: The hexagon shape allows these glass jars to fit together in an efficient and aesthetic honeycomb pattern
The glass is simple to clean as you can fully submerge these jars in water with no fear of water build-up or rust
The small jars are ideal for people who typically cook for one
The strong magnets are safely covered up so they won't come in contact with your herbs and spices
cons: Spice jars sit at a significantly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Cannot find a shaker top that will fit.
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely beautiful and well crafted but sadly without the shaker top, they make adding spices more of a hassle. I knew that they did not come with the shaker tops. What I didn't know was that it is impossible to find shaker tops that fit! The diameter of the top is not a standard size and I fear even if it were then the magnet protrusion of the lid would complicate things further. I hate to leave critical reviews especial for a small company but I feel that it's important to share this with folks. I wouldn't have made the large purchase if I had known this.
customer_reviews.author: TooManyPets

customer_reviews.title: Great limited storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny kitchen and an enormous passion for baking, cooking and eating! With limited cabinet space, eliminating the need for a spice cabinet freed up an ton of space for more kitchen supplies! It's also a great use of the otherwise cluttered side of my refrigerator and it's fun to organize them by color as functional culinary art! I'm a repeat customer and I'm obsessed with these jars! I also love their etsy shop!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're so cute! And convenient. I added a piece of metal to the bottom of my cupboard and stick them up underneat the cupboard. Out of the way but super easy to grab when I need them!
customer_reviews.author: Daniellelt

customer_reviews.title: Not usable
customer_reviews.text: This is unfortunate because I really liked them, but they would not stick to the side of my refrigerator. I have a new Samsung with a textured side and the magnets just slid right off. And these were the small jars, not the large ones. I was trying to replace the magnetic metal spice containers with the lids from hell, so I know that the proper magnet will work on my refrigerator. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: Defective Lids
customer_reviews.text: I have three lids that do not have the product name listed on the magnet, all of which will not stay on the base. There are no problems with the remaining lids which have the name listed on the magnet. I’d be happy to change this 1 star rating to a 5 if the company makes this right. I’d like to contact the seller for a partial replacement but Amazon makes that next to impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Good Quality! Love the look of the jars very unique. Great way to organize your spices. Large holds a typical spice jar at the store I love the small ones as well for less used spices. Getting both sizes is a good to consider. Gnesis spice sells their organic spices on their website with the perfect amount to fill the jars small or large. Great buy definitely no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Very mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these, and the size is good for the amount of spices we burn through. However, several of the heavier spices make the containers slide down the fridge (garlic salt, for example). Pressing the lids outwards from the inside alleviated the problem somewhat, but not enough so we ended up buying bar neodymium magnets to serve as a sort of baseline. With the added bar magnets, everything is good, but I'm a little upset I had to get them to make these usable. I like the labels that came with it, and there was a label for every spice we use, which I would guess is more than the average household.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they cost more, but they work better than the rest!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my purchase of the large magnetic spice containers. I have over thirty jars on display. They are so easy to reach when cooking and baking. And I always know when I’m running low on my spices. I get a lot of positive comments about my spice rack. I think this company has a great product and I like that they respond quickly and professionally to any communication I’ve had in the past. Go ahead and make the investment, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Prosperian

customer_reviews.title: WORK PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: After going through different failed ideas/products for my under the cabinet spice jar project - I was relieved to find these. I was starting to think my idea was not going to work. They work PERFECTLY! Don't forget to purchase the magnetic wall plate (link below). They are designed to work together, and they do! Trust me, I tried magnetic tape (with magnets super glued to jar lid), magnetic knife holders, and a couple different styles of jars. These are the best I have found! The only negative is the labels are not very inclusive. I bought a separate set of 315 pre-printed spice labels that fit perfectly on the bottom of these jars.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but they’re just jars.
customer_reviews.text: I like these overall, but they’re overpriced. The lids are not actually magnetic. They just put a magnet on the inside of a regular jar lid. That wouldn’t be so bad except if you’re putting something really dense in here—a finer grind like paprika—when it’s full the magnet is barely strong enough to hold the jar. It feels a little precarious and occasionally they slide a little. If all you’re doing is putting some after-market magnets in one side of the lid, at least get some really strong magnets.
customer_reviews.author: N. Russell

customer_reviews.title: I want MORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little jars for my spices. The magnets are really strong and when they are hung up, they look like wall art. Such a great idea. The only thing I wish they had was a shaker plate under the cap since I have a tendency to over-poor. But overall I am very pleased with my purchase and plan to buy a lot more jars....ok, I like spices....get off me!! Haha....but seriously, these are great!!!
customer_reviews.author: BATS

customer_reviews.title: Too small, won't stay in place on fridge
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was really looking forward to these. Waited until my tax return to buy them. Pretty disappointed. They hardly stay in place on the fridge once you put something in them. They don't fall off, but just slide down the fridge at the slightest touch. They are also TINY. Defeats the purpose of saving space when spice from a standard spice container won't fit in it. Returning this, not worth the $45.
customer_reviews.author: KT Pete

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous way to organize spices!
customer_reviews.text: I love these jars! I have both large and small and I just placed another order. I am a cook, and I've been struggling with various sorts of ways to support my spices for YEARS, and I think I've tried just about everything to my immense frustration. These little babies are the perfect solution, I can buy, or dry, just the amount of spice I need, decant into the jars and reach for them whenever I need them because they live on the FRONT OF MY REFRIGERATOR! My family thinks they looks like strands of DNA - and perhaps they are - at least to the wonderful food that comes out of my kitchen as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Poole

customer_reviews.title: This is now on my favorite list of items for Christmas and birthday gifts for ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of small jars and one large set for our kitchen. I was able to fit all 44 jars on a 10" x 20" stainless steel plate with space between the jars. My husband use to become impatient looking through the spice cabinet when we cooked together. We have received so many compliments about the display mounted on the back splash and we appreciate the quick access to the spices. This is now on my favorite list of items for Christmas and birthday gifts for my adult children.
customer_reviews.author: Isa V-J

customer_reviews.title: Best spice organizer out there!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these spice jars. They magnets it these are a lot mor powerful than I expected them to be. I would definitely recommend the larger ones though. They hold about an average sized spice jar. The smaller versions hold less than half of a store bought spice jar. They look amazing and are always a center of conversation when guests see them. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: The Dreadbug

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Love the decluttered counters
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small jars first and now got the larger one. I love the look and the space saving of these jars. I am finding though that some spices are too heavy for the magnets. The larger jars may need to have a bit stronger magnet! My husband has some i am using and I love the jars. I don't want you to think I'm complaining I'm not. I just thought you should be aware of the problem. image1.jpeg
customer_reviews.author: Reasmom

customer_reviews.title: Storing spices  in plain view. GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that I could gain more space in my cupboard by putting my these magnetic spice jars on my refrigerator. What a great idea. I thought it might be a problem remembering what was what but it's not. I bought the large and the small. Perfect sizes and it looks great using both together in their own space and design.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, beautiful jars. I have the magnetic metal spice canisters on the magnetic strips inside my pantry door, and I love them. But these jars are even more beautiful. They are on the side of refrigerator and I get complement after compliment. All the jars are full, and I've never had one slip. Yet easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good looking; Small.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little jars, emphasis on little. I was expecting something in the way of a small jam-jar size. In reality they are more like.... somewhere between a golf ball and a lemon. Definitely cannot fit a full McCormicks-style spice jar into just one. However, the magnet is sturdy, the labels are easy to use, and the hexagonal shape of the jar doesn't waste space the way a round jar would. I like mine and won't return them, but I'm not sure if I'd spend this much again on this size.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Take a look at this product, the large and small, the metal wall plate. This has been one of the best investments I have made. I installed the metal place inside my cupboard. I use large and small jars. Total space saver, and simply ease of use. I actually bought different labels, black with white letters because my eyesight is a bit challenged. I have all of my spices clearly labeled, easy to see, each to reach, easy to use. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Free your spices from your cupboard!
customer_reviews.text: I'm converting to the Gneiss life! I bought a set of custom spices on their website, and their spices are FAR SUPERIOR to grocery store spices. I'm buying empty jars to at least keep the remainder of my grocery store spices tidy and visible, so I can use them up and replace them w/ Gneiss spice. I stick the magnetic jar to my fridge, and it 1) looks super cute, 2) inspires me to cook more, and 3) so much easier to use when they are within arm's reach and instantly identifiable.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: THE MAGNETS WORK WELL
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of spice jars. There are some knock-offs on Amazon, but almost all of them had complaints about not sticking well to a refrigerator. Not these jars! I've done several "slam tests" with all 24 jars hanging off my freezer door. They're sticking there perfectly. The hexagons look great. The seal is good, and the magnets are strong. Glad I shelled out a few extra bucks for a spice rack solution that works. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a nice spice rack but every one would take up to much space or just cheaply made. I looked at a Lot of magnetic ones but they were all cheap metal and plastic and far from airtight. Then I saw these... Omg just love these! It's so wonderful to have counter space and reachable herbs! Loved so much I shared these and the large ones I bought with my daughter in law. And then bought more lol
customer_reviews.author: cynth

customer_reviews.title: Great solution
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love how the lids are magnetic and the all fit together. My only slight complaint is that that slide around very easily on my fridge. I came up with a way to increase the friction between the cap and the fridge by putting little puffy stickers on top of the lids. Is it a little more expensive than getting all the components myself? Sure, but we did it in an afternoon and looks great, will be getting some more very soon
customer_reviews.author: R. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Good product but at a cost .
customer_reviews.text: You sent an email asking me for feedback . I wanted to let you know that because of price I passed you by several times . I promised my wife I would have her kitchen done by this Friday so I purchased your product due to the fact I could not find anything better . Good product , other than price I am happy .
customer_reviews.author: JAMES ZICH

customer_reviews.title: Cheap magnets
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for magnetic spice jars that were prettier, more unique than the typical tin ones. Although these jars are just as pretty as they appear, sadly I could have made them myself for a lot cheaper. For $65 I was expecting something a lot stronger. These are typical canning jars with a small magnet glued inside the lid. The jars are too heavy for the magnet, which results in them sliding down my fridge. Unfortunately, instead of looking organized, they look like I just randomly put them anywhere. For the price, I would suggest the whole cap be magnetic and much stronger.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: We had a difficult time figuring out where and how to put on the spice labels. That being said, we love the product. It is well made and looks really neat on the fridge. Furthermore it doesn't take up much room either. We bought the size small. Maybe if I were to do it all over, I'd get the large size.
customer_reviews.author: munkymama

customer_reviews.title: We had a difference idea for these wonderful magnetic spice rack (and now more
customer_reviews.text: We had a difference idea for these wonderful magnetic spice rack (and now more!!) we travel and my wife always brings home a tiny bit sand from each place. and she had them stashed in different hiding places around the home. Now all labeled and organized....and in a safe place. thanks!! Hopefully we will need to order some more soon....
customer_reviews.author: gloverelace dot com

customer_reviews.title: Works great...priced high!
customer_reviews.text: I do love these! They work great, hold a full bottle (large size) and the stickers are nice. Every sticker option under the sun which is great! Just wish it wasn’t so expensive! It seems very over priced. I would love more but...yeah it takes a dent out of ur wallet!
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Harpel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  Functional and Beautiful.  Strong Magnets.
customer_reviews.text: These jars are pricey, but they're worth it. Magnets are super strong and can hold a full jar of dried herbs or about half a jar of homemade spice rubs (depending on how much heavy elements like kosher salt are in the mix). The jars fit together very well and look great on the side of the fridge. This is a great way to store large amounts of freshly dried herbs/spice rubs without taking up all the space in your cupboards. I highly recommend these jars for any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Cool display, gets lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Very cool little jars. These jars hold a small amount of spices but display them in a nifty way. We do hate having to wash them, because moisture sticks around like all glass jars. But just pop them in the oven at a low temperature, and they are good to go again.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: strong magnets, beautiful jars
customer_reviews.text: Best features: strong magnets, beautiful jars, great label assortment, eco-friendly company supportive of zero-waste goals Drawbacks: when used on a piece of sheet metal, the magnets in the large jars are too strong to let you slide jars around; you have to use your entire hand to tip them sideways to be able to pick them up (no problem with the smaller jars)
customer_reviews.author: Villager19

customer_reviews.title: Love these would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The large ones can fit quite a bit of spices. Love having my spices out in a visually appealing display - also love that they’re out of the way freeing up cabinet space. I like that the magnets seem strong so I’m not worrying about them being easily knocked.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Plenty large!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these spice jars and really excited to put them to use! I wanted to leave a review because I was initially interested in the small jars but was swayed to buy the large ones by reviews I read that they were too small for much utility. I have to say, I am happy with these large ones but wish I had bought the small ones. These are plenty big to transfer my half-used grocery store spices into, and I would say in the future that these are most useful for spices that you want to have a lot of one hand. Looking forward to adding small jars to my collection too!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Leiter-Mason

customer_reviews.title: Clever
customer_reviews.text: Clever. These are pretty simple, and you could likely make your own for cheaper, but I like letting someone else do that work. My only wish is that they were bigger. These are 4 fluid oz jars, whereas most of the spices in my cabinet are about 4 oz by weight. I can only get maybe half of a typical store spice jar in one of these. Granted, there is likely a diminishing benefit of grip as you increase the jar size.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Frankovitch

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, practical, and great for organizing your spice cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a slightly stronger magnet, since when they are fully filled with certain heavier spices they tend to slip on the fridge. Overall, still a great deal, holds about 2.5 oz (70 grams) of spice per large jar, and the containers seem very durable. They also come with all the labels you could need so that’s a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: You will need more jars than you think you will.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good idea and the jars seal tightly. The only concern is that they don’t always hold a full small spice container that you buy at the grocery store. Twelve easily fit on one magnetic board with room for more. They were slightly steeper in price than I would like to pay but it was for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Snickerfritz

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, and holds well to the side of our ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, and holds well to the side of our fridge. Unfortunately, even the large size containers don't hold full bottles of spices like basil (or other leafy/bulky spices).
customer_reviews.author: kensi

customer_reviews.title: Missing labels
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Only reason I’m giving it less stars is two things. One it didn’t come with any labels. And I couldn’t find anywhere to talk to the seller. To let them know. If they do let me know. And send the labels. I will change my review.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! It is a decorative yet productive way of organizing my spices. I have 1 large set for all of my go to seasonings and 1 smaller set for the less used. I plan to purchase one more large set for the additional spices I will need in the future. Magnets are strong, they don't slide down over time, seals are fantastic for keeping everything fresh. The only suggested improvement would be some of the labels need more description.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Senger

customer_reviews.title: Love love LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Was on the fence because of price but added them to our wedding registry and, voila! The only thing that would make them better is a removable shaker top. Had to buy magnetic measuring spoons to help overcome this deficiency. With that being said, we love them and will probably buy more! (Hoping they've come out with the Shaker tops by then? Hey, a girl can hope!)
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop!

customer_reviews.title: love the design and practicality
customer_reviews.text: These were so different. I love them. The magnets are very strong, so I have no worries of them slipping or falling off the fridge. They cleared up so much cabinet space and have made cooking easier. I can see what I have, easy to access and also see what i need to replace or re-fill.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Simple, works well.
customer_reviews.text: The jars look really nice (I am always getting compliments) and are easy to just grab, use, and put back on the fridge. The small size is good if you aren't plowing through the spices and like to buy by weight rather than in the McCormick-type containers. I think they are pricey for what they are, but I have a tiny kitchen so it was worth it to me to find a good space-saver.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Container too heavy to hold itself, even w/o spices
customer_reviews.text: the magnets wouldn't hold up on the jar on any magnetic surface... just slid down it. Very disappointment and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Love Them But They Won't  Stick To My Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order and they are so nice, however I am DEVASTATED to find out that they won't stick to my fridge for whatever reason!!! They just slide to the ground. I will contact the company. Any suggestions will help me. I will not return them. I want to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyChooChoo

customer_reviews.title: Plus they look nice! The magnets are very strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them. We have them on a 10 x 10 steel wall plate in our RV bought you can put them on a stainless steel fridge. They hold plenty of spice about the size of a half or small spice bottle you’d buy at the store. Plus they look nice! The magnets are very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Anne McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a small space in our RV and only ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a small space in our RV and only migrated slightly after several hours of rough road. Very happy I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Sew Sew

customer_reviews.title: Great jars!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome jars! For those who say they slide down their fridge, try on the front... mine slid when I put it on the side, but not on the front. I plan to order more soon. It's great to see all my spices instead of rifling through the whole shelf full.
customer_reviews.author: April Benefield

customer_reviews.title: A Hit with the misses.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these. She loves to cook, so having these on display on the fridge makes her smile when she sees them. They are a little on the pricey side but worth it. She ended up needing 34 small jars and 12 big jars. She also likes there are no holes in the lids so the spices will keep fresh longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment!!! Excellent Quality!!!  So pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Great idea! Looks fantastic on display! So many compliments! I love having my spices in view while cooking! So convenient! I use them more regularly and have expanded the variety of what I use as well!
customer_reviews.author: H. Taber

customer_reviews.title: Gneiss Spice
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen, short on counter space. With my spices in clear view on my refrigerator it is so much easier to get to. I would like to have more of these eventually. I find them to be just the right size for one person to store spices. You may wish to go bigger if you have a large family.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McCombs

customer_reviews.title: Gneiss is Nice! Looks great on my fridge.
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this product. The quality and design are impeccable as well as unique. If you're deciding between the Gneiss Spice and of the knock-off's let me tell you I ordered both and I only still have the Gneiss Spice. The knock-off is made of cheap tin and plastic with a magnet that barely sticks to the surface while the Gneiss Spice feels like it will hold up forever. The magnet they use is strong so I never have to worry about it just falling off. It also feels great to support a small business. All around one of the best decisions I made for our kitchen. Strong recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! Great for saving space! Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: lindalou

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.text: So aesthetically pleasing on a fridge and holds a decent amount of spice! I will definitely be purchasing more in the future but would most likely opt to get the bigger size since the majority of my spices I use so consistently I wouldn’t have to purchase them at the store so often to refill my jars
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: So happy about these!!!
customer_reviews.text: These jars are so aesthetically pleasing! I was trying to find a new way of organising my spices because my cabinets were a crowded mess! I try my hardest to find a solution that didn’t involve plastic or taking up any counter space. I love that these are made of a sturdy glass and I can just stick them to the refrigerator, which gets them out of my cabinets. Once all put up they make a really pretty display!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and nifty jars to save space. I ordered the 12 large jars (should have ordered more) that are super expensive. Thus far they seem worth it but I need like 12 more. ;) these are stylish on the side of my fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Saves kitchen space and looks really great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a week now on my fridge and I really appreciate their convenience and how great they look! I used to have Ikea metallic containers for this purpose and those were more fussy to unscrew. I find the large jars are good for me. I use a lot of spices in cooking, so these are large enough for that, but not so large that my spices will go stale. A brilliant solution that saves space in the kitchen and is very functional!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent and fun storage devices. You can mix and match these on your fridge, or via their mounting brackets where ever you have room. They have a strong seal, and tight lids so you do not have to worry about losing your spices.
customer_reviews.author: Warren L. Vidic

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: They are worth every penny. The magnets stick well and the jars are sturdy. I measured our spices in advance. Most spice jars are equivalent to the larger Gneiss jar size (seen here) which makes them perfect for eliminating extra clutter in the pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: I absolute love these spice containers
customer_reviews.text: I absolute love these spice containers. I ordered the small containers. I received two lids in which obtained two small magnets in the lid. They do not magnetized to the refrigerator or the metal plate. The rest of my containers with the large magnetic embossed with the word Genesis work perfect. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Fun AND Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love these spice jars! They are space saving and very beautiful. Art meets functionality in your kitchen. I have 24 of the small jars and needed some big ones for things like garlic and Old Bay - things I use a lot of. They come with a vast array of labels to choose from. The magnets on the lids are very strong - no fear that they are going to slide down your fridge. A bonus - the company, Gneiss, is very nice and customer support is great.
customer_reviews.author: Althea Christine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Up to the task.
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace the 'stainless' steel cylinders that are also popular. These have a positive seal and strong magnets. I will point out that under the magnet disc are a pair of smaller rare earth magnets; I found that out when I disassembled to give them an initial wash.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT K.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These didn't have labels for all of our spices, but we have a lot of bizarre mixes. It does come with a lot of your more common single spice labels. Just make sure when you remove them from the board, you don't twist and pull. My husband had a small mishap with some onion powder when he first filled the spice jars. Overall, I love the style and product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Howald

customer_reviews.title: Love the product except for one small thing
customer_reviews.text: Love these products, honestly the only thing holding me back from giving it five stars is that larger measuring spoons like tablespoon size don't fit. But, aestethically and spaspace saving wise, which were the main two reasons I bought them, they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Bought more already
customer_reviews.text: Love these jars just bought more -looks great on a mounted cookie sheet. Form and function at its best
customer_reviews.author: Jo B

customer_reviews.title: A must for campers.
customer_reviews.text: I just love the spice jars. The quality and craftsmanship are really very very good. Even the customer service from the seller is 5star.
customer_reviews.author: rsuraj7

customer_reviews.title: Storage problem = solved!
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking, especially with spices. However full time RVing doesn’t give a lot of storage space for them. These are amazing! They stay in place going down the road & everyone compliments them. I’ll definitely be ordering more as I still have plenty more spices to add!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous seller!
customer_reviews.text: A few Jars were broken upon arrival. Immediately replaced, no questions asked! Wonderful product, great for economizing space in kitchen. Stick hard to the side of fridge. Will buy more when have time! Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't slide if you center the magnet
customer_reviews.text: I love these a bit expensive. but frees up room in my pantry. as for the sliding down the fridge as some said. you need to take the lid off and center the magnet then works fine. they look very nice on the side of my fridge.
customer_reviews.author: L. Marsalko

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy jars and magnets - it works
customer_reviews.text: These are as described and I tried them on a metal board. Just decided I didn’t like the look in my modern kitchen. And spices should be kept in cool dark spot so there was that. Jars are thick and super sturdy. And magnets are strong and keep jar attached to the metal board.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl - Holland Mi

customer_reviews.title: Size!
customer_reviews.text: I totally agree with others who criticized this product due to its small size. The large ones are very large and small ones are very small. If you created a medium size that fit 2.5 ounces of spice, it would be perfect for storing the amount generally sold in stores. Aside from that (major) criticism, I like the jars, magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D. Disney

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these jars! They look great on my refrigerator, have opened up shelf space, and make seasoning convenient. I ordered 2 sets before, and just added another because they are gorgeous. A quality product! Well designed, with strong magnets. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, wish the magnet was a bit stronger.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these jars. Labels are great. I wish the magnet was stronger because they often slide down the fridge until they stay put.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love. I get tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about spending so much money on a spice rack, but once I got it up (with the smaller base), I fell in love. I get tons of compliments, looks great and saves precious counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Renee Draginoff

customer_reviews.title: Cute jars
customer_reviews.text: I love how cute these are! I wish they weren't so expensive; I would buy SOOOO many more! One of mine slide down the fridge like others have stated. ☹ I just prop it up with some of the others.
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that they don’t have shaker tops but other than that they’re great. I tried to make shaker tops for them but didn’t have any luck. I like how they look and they hold a decent amount of spice. I sure I’ll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: SHAPES.  ADDED A GREAT SHAPE FOR GRANDCHILDREN TO PLAY WITH ON FRIDGE.
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE VERY PRETTY AFTER BEING FILLED WITH VARIOUS SPICES, VERY STURDY AND AN OK SIZE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like these a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really like these a lot. My only wish would be plastic shaker covers to help control amount of spice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: coolest ever
customer_reviews.text: The coolest ever way to manage spices. Decorative and functional. The glass cleans up so well after cooking!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Weller

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I really love this concept. The small jar at really small and the large jars are just so expensive! But I still love using them. When I’m feeling indulgent I will spring for the large jar set
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: An organizer that adds color to your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: These spice jars are very cool. As someone who is rarely domestically organized, these spice jars not only fit together brilliantly but also look like significant effort went into the design of my kitchen. Once I hung them on the *Gneiss Spice Wall Plate Base*, I actually went shopping for certain colors of spices so that I could add more colors to my kitchen wall (turmeric was a great addition). I get complements on them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: I love my Gneiss Spice rack
customer_reviews.text: I love my Gneiss Spice rack. I just wish the bottles weren't so expensive. They are a great idea and such a space saver. I can now see and find whatever spice I'm looking for as they are perfectly organized.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse May

customer_reviews.title: Great stay-fresh spice saving system!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these jars! I've experimented with some of the spices I chose and have not been disappointed with my purchase. It is out of the way yet so convenient at the same time. Had them hanging for almost a year now and used regularly. Nice, strong hold keeps jars in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work of art but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love how this spice organizer creates a piece of art in my kitchen! It is expensive, but I have been wanting it for a whole year so I decided to go for it and I’m so glad I did! Definitely get the 24 bottles...12 would be too small of an amount and would love weird on the metal plate.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use these on my fridge for loose leaf tea. I love them
customer_reviews.author: BusyKittie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but wow!
customer_reviews.text: So overpriced but still my best purchase of 2018. Love these and get so many compliments on them. But then im embaraced when people want a link for them and they costed me an arm and a leg
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Small kitchen, pretty spice rack
customer_reviews.text: Moved into a house with a smaller kitchen and found these to help with clutter on the side of the fridge. They're awesome and don't look bad either. Everything help up during shipment and they hold a decent amount without any sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Thornton

customer_reviews.title: so I'm as happy as can be
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them, so I'm as happy as can be. Great quality and work great! Helps get clutter off the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I just renovated our kitchen and we wanted to create a display for our spices that was practical. The hexagonal shape creates some pretty cool designs and we just love it. It's a great space saver and creates an awesome display I highly recommend these containers.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G Trent

customer_reviews.title: I have never been so pleased with a product
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so pleased with a product. Looks great. Spices are filled & stays on fridge perfectly. So many times I didn't add a spice to my cooking just because I didn't feel like sifting though the spice cabinet... now they are all at my fingertips!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Ethical and awesome
customer_reviews.text: This company produces ethical and beautiful spice containers. They are smaller than store containers but if you shop in the bulk section you'll be perfect, even Kroger has a bulk spice section. I can't wait to get another set!
customer_reviews.author: Karina Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with these
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with these. Great quality. Only wish the stickers had more spice names. Other than that. These are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this. The jars look beautiful on my fridge ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The jars look beautiful on my fridge and the quality is great. Included labels are great (and robust with options) I would highly recommend these. also, love buying small business. :) packaging was stellar! Thanks you for a beautiful product that is a huge space saver. Small cabinets, too many spoces! The magnetized jars helped clear up a lot of cabinet space for me!
customer_reviews.author: Erin E Holsinger

customer_reviews.title: Looks "gneiss" and functions well
customer_reviews.text: Stunning set up for my spices! Jars hold their plave when full. Beth has great customer service, too!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Healy-McGue

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much that I bought 4! The magnet is very strong and they interlock very nicely. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Helgemoe

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking so much easier.
customer_reviews.text: I love these jars! I no longer have to look around for my spices in the cabinet. They are now conveniently located right next to my stove on the side of my fridge. They also have amazing customer service. A few of the jars with the heavier spices were slipping a little. I emailed them and they sent me extra small magnets which solved the issue. I highly recommend the jars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this! Worth every penny !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Moved into a small apartment and need space for all my spices and baking supplies. These provided the space for my spices so I had cupboard space for my baking supplies. One of the best ideas for the chef with a small kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glass spice jars
customer_reviews.text: I love these spice jars. The magnets are super strong and work well on my fridge. I like that the jars are glass and won't air out easily. They're fun to make designs with too!
customer_reviews.author: Dunsh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this I have it hanging above my kitchen entrance the door frame is mettle and it’s very convenient just cook and grab what I need again love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne hinds

customer_reviews.title: Check your jars carefully
customer_reviews.text: One of the jars doesn’t hang on the fridge because it only has two tiny magnets in the lid. At $4 a jar, you’d think there’d be better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Gneiss Spice Small Empty Magnetic Spice Jars | Create a DIY Hanging Spice Rack on Your Fridge | Includes Hexagon Glass Jars, Magnetic Lids + Spice Labels (10 Small Jars, Silver Lids)
feature_bullets: Declutter your spices into a work of art!

Stylish jars stick to your fridge, saving valuable kitchen space. With spices in sight, you’ll use them more often; no more digging in cabinets for stale spices or buying duplicates. Reusable and refillable, Gneiss Spice jars are an eco-friendly addition to a zero waste kitchen.

Smooth glass showcases spices. Durable containers are airtight and last longer than metal tins. Strong neodymium magnets keep jars from sliding; jars stick to a swinging refrigerator door. Set includes 72 washable spice label stickers that can be placed on lids or glass bottoms. OPTIONAL: Add a steel wall base to display on backsplash, pantry door, or mounted under a cupboard.

Empty small jars measure 2” tall x 1.75” wide and hold a shy 1/4 cup volume; they are much smaller than traditional spice bottles. Small jars are perfect for lesser used spices. Ground spices should be used within 6-12 months; choose jar size accordingly to ensure fresh spices. Jars are available pre-filled. Our specialty is creating personalized spice sets from our collection of 200+ gourmet organic seasonings. Size-appropriate refills packaged in compostable bags available online.
Woman owned and operated; products are produced in our Maine studio from materials sourced in the USA and abroad. Buy worry-free with our lifetime warranty and fantastic customer service!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars565 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
